issue.title: link to the download file is impossible if the download directory is protected
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

The lien near the upload field in the diffusion panel is a direct link to the file on the server, it should be a link to the download shop service. Indeed if the directory is htaccess protected (and it should be), it is impossible to download it.

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.1
